name: Zuggtmoy
immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Zuggtmoy's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 22). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants, ray of sickness * 3/day each: dispel magic, ensnaring strike, entangle, plant growth * 1/day each: etherealness, teleport

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
